sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; const WeatherIcons = { 0: 'â˜€ï¸', // Clear sky 1: 'ðŸŒ¤ï¸', // Mainly clear 2: 'ðŸŒ¥ï¸', // Partly cloudy 3: 'â˜ï¸', // Overcast 45: 'ðŸŒ«ï¸', // Fog and depositing rime fog 48: 'ðŸŒ«ï¸', // Fog and depositing rime fog 51: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸', // Drizzle: Light intensity 53: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸', // Drizzle: Moderate intensity 55: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸', // Drizzle: Dense intensity 56: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸â„ï¸', // Freezing Drizzle: Light intensity 57: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸â„ï¸', // Freezing Drizzle: Dense intensity 61: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸', // Rain: Slight intensity 63: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸', // Rain: Moderate intensity 65: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸', // Rain: Heavy intensity 66: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸â„ï¸', // Freezing Rain: Light intensity 67: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸â„ï¸', // Freezing Rain: Heavy intensity 71: 'ðŸŒ¨ï¸', // Snow fall: Slight intensity 73: 'ðŸŒ¨ï¸', // Snow fall: Moderate intensity 75: 'ðŸŒ¨ï¸', // Snow fall: Heavy intensity 77: 'ðŸŒ¨ï¸', // Snow grains 80: 'ðŸŒ¦ï¸', // Rain showers: Slight intensity 81: 'ðŸŒ¦ï¸', // Rain showers: Moderate intensity 82: 'ðŸŒ§ï¸', // Rain showers: Violent intensity 85: 'ðŸŒ¨ï¸â„ï¸', // Snow showers: Slight intensity 86: 'ðŸŒ¨ï¸â„ï¸', // Snow showers: Heavy intensity 95: 'â›ˆï¸', // Thunderstorm: Slight or moderate 96: 'â›ˆï¸', // Thunderstorm with slight hail 99: 'â›ˆï¸â„ï¸', // Thunderstorm with heavy hail }; const WeatherIcon = ({ code }) => { return {WeatherIcons[code]}; }; export default WeatherIcon;
